Related Character(s): 夒, 猱, 獶
Связанный символ (и): 夒, 猱, 猱

獿字的基本解释

獿
náo
古同“獶”。

獿
yōu
古同“獶”。

獿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［náo］
［《集韻》奴刀切，平，泥。］
亦作“獿1”。
(1)亦作“獿”。同“猱”。兽名，猿属。
(2)亦作“獿”。见“獶人”。
(3)通“擾”。乱，惊乱。

獿字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獿； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页721第23
【唐韻】女交切【集韻】尼交切，?音鐃。【說文】獿，㺒也。从犬，夒聲。【集韻】犬吠。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?奴刀切，音峱。【廣韻】獸名。【集韻】本作夒。或作獶猱蝚。詳猱字註。　又【前漢·揚雄傳】獿人亡則匠石輟斤而不敢妄斲。【註】服虔曰：獿，古之善塗墍者也。師古曰：墍，卽今之仰泥也。獿，抆拭也。故謂塗者爲獿人。獿，乃高反。　又【集韻】奴回切，音?。古之善塗墍者。【漢書·獿人註】師古曰：?，又乃迴反。【集韻】或作?，通作?。　又【廣韻】奴巧切【集韻】女巧切，?音撓。【廣韻】犬驚。【集韻】犬驚吠貌。　又【集韻】【類篇】?爾紹切，音擾。義同。

獿字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
獿字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [náo]
["Jiyun" slave knife cut, flat , mud. ]
Also known as "獿1".
(1) Also known as "獿". Same as "猱". Animal name, ape.
(2) Also known as "獿". See "Human".
(3) Through "disturbance". Chaos, panic.
獿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　獿; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 721 23
[Tang Yun] Female cross cut [Ji Yun] Ni cross cut,? Yin 铙. [Speaking text] 獿, 㺒 also. From the dog, baosheng. [Ji Yun] The dog barks.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Slave knife cut, sound. 【Guangyun】The name of the animal. [Ji Yun] This is a 夒. Or as a scorpion. Detailed notes on the word 猱.　[Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] If a person dies, the carpenter will not dare to do anything arrogantly. [Note] Fuqian said: 獿, the goodness of the ancients is also the one who paints the 墍墍. Shigu said: 墍，卽卽 Yang Ni is also today. Yi, wipe it. Therefore, those who paint are called Yiren. Wu is a high antithesis.　[Jiyun] Slave cut back again, sound?. The goodness of the ancients paints the maid. [Han Shu·Yi Ren's Note] Shi Gu said:? [Ji Yun] Or for?, general for?.　[Guangyun] Slave Qiaoqi [Jiyun] Female Qiaoqi,? Yin Nao. [Guang Yun] Dog is shocked. [Ji Yun] The dog is screaming and barking.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Er Shaoqie, sound disturbance. The same meaning.
